skillTree.name: Wind Harmony
skillTree.description: The turbulent Winds of Magic can do little harm to those who have found harmony amidst its raging currents.

skillTree.name: Ranged Discipline
skillTree.description: The best way to repel the chaotic flurry of missile fire is to meet it with order, discipline, and a stalwart row of shields.

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: When normally killed in battle, this Lord will be wounded instead

skillTree.name: The Fury of Dragons
skillTree.description: While powerful, the Dragons that protect Cathay cannot be in all places at once. Sometimes, they send those that they trust the most and infuse them with a small fraction of their power.

skillTree.name: Warhorse
skillTree.description: Enables the Warhorse

skillTree.name: Martial Mastery (Skill Dump)
skillTree.description: When everything else fails, there is always studying the blade. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)

skillTree.name: Defensive Dedication (Skill Dump)
skillTree.description: Wielding the shield is better than returning on it. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)

skillTree.name: Hard to Hit
skillTree.description: Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, itâ€™s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.

skillTree.name: Devastating Charge
skillTree.description: Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.

skillTree.name: Full Plate Armour
skillTree.description: Full-Plate armour protects the wearer from head-to-foot. Many such suits are blessed or imbued with arcane abilities.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Deadly Blade
skillTree.description: A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Wound-Maker
skillTree.description: Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Ready for Battle
skillTree.description: A Celestial Champion and his soldiers are always prepared to march and battle against any enemy of the Celestial Dragons.

skillTree.name: Why Do We Fight
skillTree.description: To protect home and family. To preserve balance and bring Harmony!

effects.description:
Weapon Strength: +3% for Peasant Long Spearmen, Peasant Swordsmen, Peasant Horsemen, The Fearles Wall, and The Fearless Wall (Halberds) units
	(Lord's army)

Reload Time Reduction: +4% for Peasant Archers, and The Fearless Wall (Bows) units
	(Lord's army)

Armour-Piercing Damage: +2 for All Peasant, and The Fearless Wall units
	(Lord's army)

	(Lord's army)

Reload Time Reduction: +8% for Peasant Archers, and The Fearless Wall (Bows) units
	(Lord's army)

Armour-Piercing Damage: +3 for All Peasant, and The Fearless Wall units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon Strength: +9% for Peasant Long Spearmen, Peasant Swordsmen, Peasant Horsemen, The Fearles Wall, and The Fearless Wall (Halberds) units
	(Lord's army)

Reload Time Reduction: +12% for Peasant Archers, and The Fearless Wall (Bows) units
	(Lord's army)

Armour-Piercing Damage: +3 for All Peasant, and The Fearless Wall units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: The Dragons' Fire
skillTree.description: When the guns and rockets from Cathay open fire, many Chaos tribesmen believe they are being attacked by the Celestial Dragons themselves.

effects.description:
Range: +3% for All Infantry With Gunpowder Weapons, Artillery, and Flying War Machines units
	(Lord's army)

Reload Time Reduction: +4% for for All Infantry With Gunpowder Weapons, Artillery, and Flying War Machines units
	(Lord's army)

Range: +6% for All Infantry With Gunpowder Weapons, Artillery, and Flying War Machines units
	(Lord's army)

Reload Time Reduction: +8% for for All Infantry With Gunpowder Weapons, Artillery, and Flying War Machines units
	(Lord's army)

Range: +10% for All Infantry With Gunpowder Weapons, Artillery, and Flying War Machines units
	(Lord's army)

Reload Time Reduction: +12% for for All Infantry With Gunpowder Weapons, Artillery, and Flying War Machines units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: The Longest Frontier
skillTree.description: Cathay is a very big nation, with thousands of miles of roads and borders that must be patrolled everyday, lest hostile intruders manage to find their way in.

effects.description:
Melee Attack +3 for All Cavalry units
	(Lord's army)

Vigour Loss Reduction %-n% for All Cavalry units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Attack +6 for All Cavalry units
	(Lord's army)

Vigour Loss Reduction %-n% for All Cavalry units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Attack +9 for All Cavalry units
	(Lord's army)

Vigour Loss Reduction %-n% for All Cavalry units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Watchers on the Wall
skillTree.description: Soldiers, remember that you are the sword and the shield of the world of men!

effects.description:
Melee Attack +3 for Sworn Gatekeepers, Melee Frontier Guards and Melee Celestial Dragons units
	(Lord's army)

Missile Strength: +3% for Frontier Guards (Bows), Onyx Dragons, Celestial Dragons (Crossbows) units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Defence +3 for Sworn Gatekeepers, melee Frontier Guards, and Melee Celestial Dragons units

Reload Time Reduction: +4% for Frontier Guards (Bows), Onyx Dragons, Celestial Dragon (Crossbows) units

Missile Strength: +6% for Frontier Guards (Bows), Onyx Dragons, Celestial Dragons (Crossbows) units

Melee Defence +6 for Sworn Gatekeepers, melee Frontier Guards, and Melee Celestial Dragons units

Reload Time Reduction: +8% for Frontier Guards (Bows), Onyx Dragons, Celestial Dragon (Crossbows) units

Missile Strength: +9% for Frontier Guards (Bows), Onyx Dragons, Celestial Dragons (Crossbows) units

	(Lord's army)

Reload Time Reduction: +12% for Frontier Guards (Bows), Onyx Dragons, Celestial Dragon (Crossbows) units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Our Devoted Defenders
skillTree.description: The professional soldiers are very respected in Grand Cathay, as they sacrifice their lives for the greater good.

effects.description:
Weapon Strength: +3% for Melee Jade Warriors, Jade Warriors, Melee Jade Sea Dragons, and Melee Imperial Road Watch units
	(Lord's army)

Missile Strength: +3% for Jade Warrior Crossbowmen, Jade Sea Dragons (Fire Crossbows and Repeating Crossbows), and Imperial Road Watch (Bows) units

Armour: +10 for Jade Wariors, Jade Sea Dragons, and Imperial Road Watch units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Might and Magic
skillTree.description: Using the forces of geomancy to empower war machines and give life to stone is a secret very well guarded that only Cathayans have learned.

effects.description:
Melee Attack +2 for Terracotta Sentinels and Terracotta Automatons
	(Lord's army)

Melee Defence +2 for Terracotta Automatons and Wu Xing War Compass units
	(Lord's army)

Physical Resistance: +10% for Terracota Sentinel and Wu Xing War Compass units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Attack +4 for Terracotta Sentinels and Terracotta Automatons
	(Lord's army)

Melee Defence +4 for Terracotta Automatons and Wu Xing War Compass units
	(Lord's army)

Melee Attack +6 for Terracotta Sentinels and Terracotta Automatons
	(Lord's army)

Melee Defence +8 for Terracotta Automatons and Wu Xing War Compass units
	(Lord's army)

Physical Resistance: +20% for Terracota Sentinel and Wu Xing War Compass units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Blades of the Bastion
skillTree.description: Cathayan armies have been tested time and again, their skills proven in a tumultuous arena of bloodshed and near-constant war.

effects.description:
Leadership: +6 for Peasant Long Spearmen, Celestial Dragon Guard, Jade Warriors and Jade Warriors (Halberds) units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Peasant Long Spearmen, Celestial Dragon Guard, Jade Warriors and Jade Warriors (Halberds) units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Spell resistance: 10% for Peasant Long Spearmen, Celestial Dragon Guard, Jade Warriors and Jade Warriors (Halberds) units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Fast Hands
skillTree.description: When the raging of battle begins, swift hands and swifter feet are the keys to surviving at range.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +4% for Peasant Archers, Celestial Dragon Crossbowmen, Jade Warrior Crossbowmen, Iron Hail Gunners, Crane Gunners, Grand Cannon and Fire Rain Rocket units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Reload time reduction: +10% for Peasant Archers, Celestial Dragon Crossbowmen, Jade Warrior Crossbowmen, Iron Hail Gunners, Crane Gunners, Grand Cannon and Fire Rain Rocket units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for Peasant Archers, Celestial Dragon Crossbowmen, Jade Warrior Crossbowmen, Iron Hail Gunners, Crane Gunners, Grand Cannon and Fire Rain Rocket units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Unified Charge
skillTree.description: Swift, steady and moving as one, the hardy warriors of Cathay race headlong into battle.

effects.description:
Speed: +10% for Peasant Horsemen, Jade Lancers, Great Longma Riders, Terracotta Sentinel and Wu Xing War Compass units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +5 for Peasant Horsemen, Jade Lancers, Great Longma Riders, Terracotta Sentinel and Wu Xing War Compass units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: 10% for Peasant Horsemen, Jade Lancers, Great Longma Riders, Terracotta Sentinel and Wu Xing War Compass units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Looming Lanterns
skillTree.description: A blanket of glowing lights amidst the clouds is sure to stir the heart of every Cathayan warrior beneath them.

effects.description:
Leadership: +6 for Sky Lantern and Sky-junk units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Range: +15% for Sky Lantern and Sky-junk units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for Sky Lantern and Sky-junk units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Iron Disciplinarian
skillTree.description: This Lord expects utter obedience from the smallfolk, and has little time for insurrections or petty revolts.

skillTree.name: Inspiring Recruitment
skillTree.description: All warriors of honour and pride are eager to fight under the Dragon-Emperor's banners.

skillTree.name: Reassuring Presence
skillTree.description: The presence of this Lord ensures a measure of calm, reducing panic and desertion amongst followers.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Fervent
skillTree.description: Through our acts, the gods will cleanse the lands.

skillTree.name: Irrepressible
skillTree.description: Every wound that is not fatal is but a lesson to learn from.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for this Lord
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Quartermaster
skillTree.description: A good quartermaster can ration equipment and foodstuffs efficiently, making supplies last longer.

skillTree.name: Logistician
skillTree.description: Proficient with figures, this Lord, or his subordinates, can keep his army fulfilled, even in dire circumstances.

skillTree.name: Alert
skillTree.description: Countless conflicts and a keen sense of awareness have made this Lord difficult to entrap.

effects.description: Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +5%
Chance of intercepting an army using the Underway, beast-paths or Worldroots: +10%

skillTree.name: The Great Bastion
skillTree.description: The blood-soaked battlefields of the northern provinces are the proving grounds upon which the mightiest warriors of Cathay have honed their craft.

effects.description:
Attrition: -5% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

backgroundSkills.name: Martial Artist
backgroundSkills.description: When the arrows are spent and the blades are all blunted, this perfect warrior can rely on their well-trained body to keep death from their door.

backgroundSkills.name: Bureaucrat
backgroundSkills.description: Some may consider administration a tiresome process, but this servant of the Celestial Emperor knows that a tidy society makes for an efficient, effective one.

backgroundSkills.name: Fervent Questioner
backgroundSkills.description: An inquisitive nature is only part of the skillset required for the Dragon's questioner, tasked with ensuring harmony prevails over Celestial lands.

backgroundSkills.name: Solid
backgroundSkills.description: This one could challenge an Ogre to an arm-wrestling match.

backgroundSkills.name: Tactician
backgroundSkills.description: If there is anything left to learn about military planning, this one has yet to come across it.

backgroundSkills.name: Unyielding
backgroundSkills.description: What will not bend may sometimes break.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +10% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.name: Harmoniser
backgroundSkills.description: A place for everything and everything in its place. Live by this motto and Chaos will stand out like the proverbial sore thumb.

effects.description:
Leadership: +4 when fighting against Daemons of Chaos
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Enlightened
backgroundSkills.description: This one has opened their mind to ideas and concepts that would bewilder a lesser person, enabling them to harness the Winds and manipulate them with skill.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve change: +8% when increasing

backgroundSkills.name: Violent
backgroundSkills.description: Violence is always the answer, even when it's not.

backgroundSkills.name: Crafty
backgroundSkills.description: Deception is frowned upon, but only if you're found out.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +35%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.name: Trained
backgroundSkills.description: Even Slaanesh would be unable to break this one's self control.

backgroundSkills.name: Fleet of Foot
backgroundSkills.description: No being can kill what it cannot catch.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.name: Sharp
backgroundSkills.description: Very little escapes this one's notice.

backgroundSkills.name: Distinguishing Scar
backgroundSkills.description: A dashing scar completes any true warrior's look.

backgroundSkills.name: Enured
backgroundSkills.description: Hardy and resilient, this being stands firm in the face of all challenges.

backgroundSkills.name: Weapons Specialist
backgroundSkills.description: No arms have yet been forged that this warrior has been unable to master.
